Question: What accolade did 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' win at the 50th National Film Awards in 2002?
Options:
A. Best Actor
B. Best Feature Film in Hindi
C. Best Director
D. Best Cinematography

Question: In which movie did Ajay Devgn receive the Best Actor award at the National Film Awards and Filmfare Awards for his portrayal of the titular character, released in 2002?
Options:
A. A) The Legend of Bhagat Singh
B. B) Lagaan
C. C) Gangs of Wasseypur
D. D) Rang De Basanti
Answer: A) The Legend of Bhagat Singh

Question: Which composer won the Best Background Score award for the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' at the Filmfare Awards in 2002?
Options:
A. A. R. Rahman
B. Pritam
C. Ilaiyaraaja
D. A. R. Rahman and Pritam

Question: Who received the Best Film (Critics) award for 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' at the Filmfare Awards in 2002?
Options:
A. Kumar Taurani and Ramesh Taurani
B. Rajkumar Hirani
C. Karan Johar
D. Aamir Khan

Question: Which actor won the Best Actor (Critics) award for his performance in 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' released in 2002?
Options:
A. Salman Khan
B. Ajay Devgn
C. Shah Rukh Khan
D. Aamir Khan
